swm.0x10100D9: Card sync startup-file with the board and reset itself.
swm.0x201014C: Service sys verify dm verity report failure.
swm.0x201013D: The service start limit was defined and it was hit.
swm.0x201013E: A catch-all condition in case a system operation failed.
swm.0x2010150: Reboot to make cold patch take affect.

nctl.0x7020001: NCTLD process exit, and reset the board.
nctl.0x7020002: NCTLE process exit, and reset the board.
nctl.0x7020003: NTPD process exit, and reset the board.
